name: Runic
passiveSkills: Reduce all damage taken by 60% and heal for 15% of your Max HP every action
Inflict an unblockable Freeze on a random enemy at the start of battle for 3 turns
This effect does not affect bosses and can be blocked by passives and effects that specifically grant immunity to Freeze
Reduce the duration of all negative effects on each ally by 2 turns at the start of your turn after the first round of battle
Revive a random dead ally with Sacrifice and Perfect Immortality when you die.
